name: (/Home Page/) Verification for all the page links
id: stories/Home.story;(/Home Page/) Verification for all the page links

testSteps.description: (/Home Page/) Verification for all the page links #1: {elementKey=Get Your API Key, pageURL=https://developer-acct.ticketmaster.com/user/login, elementLocation=//div[@class='text-wrapper col-lg-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12']/h1[@class='only-desktop']}

children.description: Given open Home page
Open page
When check visibility and click {Get Your API Key} element of Home page
Validate and click element: Get Your API Key
Then check that new page opened from Home page has {https://developer-acct.ticketmaster.com/user/login} and {//div[@class='text-wrapper col-lg-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12']/h1[@class='only-desktop']}
Check if page is opened: https://developer-acct.ticketmaster.com/user/login, //div[@class='text-wrapper col-lg-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12']/h1[@class='only-desktop'], http://127.0.0.1:4000
